item.description:
except instead of Morrie, it'll be me. and there'll be more rock climbing. oh, and probably no one's going to make a movie out of it. But you should up anyway!

Metrorock next Tuesday, 7pm. If you haven't climbed at Metro before, you'll need to take a belay test, yadda yadda. You can drive there, or take the T to Wellington station and call the gym for a shuttle ride. check out details at their website: www.metrorock.com

see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be hanging by the picnic table around 7pm.
item.name: Tuesdays with Morrie
